H3.text: when did the usa join world war one. April 1917

A4.text: The United States became directly involved in World War I after declaring war on Germany on April 6, 1917.

A5.text: The United States proclaimed a policy of neutrality despite President Woodrow Wilson's antipathies against the German Empire.
